languages.text: When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Targets attacked with a Bloodseeker Klaive must succeed on a Toughness resistance test or suffer bleeding (4 damage at the start of each turn). Attacks with the Bloodseeker Klaive gain +20 dodge penetration as long as there is at least one bleeding creature adjacent to the wielder.

When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +<u>(5 × target's bleeding power)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +<u>(5 × target's bleeding power)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

languages.text: 当装备者使用这把利刃{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人时，会移除流血效果，并施加同等层数的{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}%，直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。

The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当装备者使用这把利刃{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人时，会移除流血效果，并施加同等层数的{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}提高<u>（5×目标流血效果层数）</u>%，直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。

当装备者使用这把利刃{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}流血{/g}状态的敌人时，会移除流血效果，并施加同等层数的{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}效果。装备者的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}提高{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}%，直到下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始为止。

languages.text: Cuando esta espada {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo con {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}hemorragia{/g}, elimina la hemorragia e inflige {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxina{/g} con la misma potencia. El portador gana +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d} % de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} hasta su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

El portador gana +<u>(5 × potencia de la hemorragia del objetivo)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} hasta su siguiente {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} dieses Schwert einen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutenden{/g} Feind, entfernt es Blutung und verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} mit derselben Kraft. Der Träger der Waffe erhält bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d} % {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g}.

The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}Trifft{/g} dieses Schwert einen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutenden{/g} Feind, entfernt es Blutung und verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} mit derselben Kraft. Der Waffenführer erhält bis zu seinem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +<u>(5 × Blutungskraft des Ziels)</u> % {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g}.

{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} dieses Schwert einen {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}blutenden{/g} Feind, entfernt es Blutung und verursacht {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Gift{/g} mit derselben Kraft. languages.text: Lorsque cette épée {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi subissant l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, elle supprime cet effet pour le remplacer par un effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} de même puissance. L'utilisateur bénéficie de +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.
languages.original_text: When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque cette épée {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}touche{/g} un ennemi frappé par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, elle supprime cet effet pour le remplacer par un effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} de même puissance. L'utilisateur bénéficie de +<u>(5 × puissance de l'effet Saignement de la cible)</u> % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

Lorsque cette épée {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} un ennemi frappé par l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}Saignement{/g}, elle supprime cet effet pour le remplacer par un effet {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}Toxine{/g} de même puissance. L'utilisateur bénéficie de +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d} % d'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} jusqu'à son {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant.

languages.text: Когда противник с {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечением{/g} получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим мечом, кровотечение заменяется на {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} той же интенсивности. Персонаж получает +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.
languages.original_text: When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник с {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечением{/g} получает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим мечом, кровотечение заменяется на {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} той же интенсивности. Персонаж получает +<u>(5 × интенсивность кровотечения цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда противник с {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечением{/g} получает {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}попадание{/g} этим мечом, кровотечение заменяется на {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} той же интенсивности. Персонаж получает +<u>(5 × интенсивность кровотечения цели)</u>% к {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}уклонению{/g} до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

Когда противник с {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}кровотечением{/g} получает {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} этим мечом, кровотечение заменяется на {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}отравление{/g} той же интенсивности. Персонаж получает +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% к {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонению{/g} до своего следующего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g}.

languages.text: この剣が{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、出血を取り除いて同じパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒素{/g}を負わせる。使用者は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を得る。
languages.original_text: When this sword {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}bleeding{/g} enemy, it removes bleeding and inflicts {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toxin{/g} of the same power. The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この剣が{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している敵に{g|Encyclopedia:Hit}命中{/g}すると、出血を取り除いて同じパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を負わせる。使用者は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+<u>(5×ターゲットの出血パワー)</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}回避{/g}を得る。

この剣が{g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}出血{/g}している敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}すると、出血を取り除いて同じパワーの{g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}毒{/g}を負わせる。使用者は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}まで+{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}%の{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}を得る。

languages.text: Bu kılıç, {g|Encyclopedia:BleedingEffect}kan kaybeden{/g} bir düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} kanama etkisini ortadan kaldırırken aynı güçte {g|Encyclopedia:ToxinEffect}toksin{/g} etkisi uygular. Kullanan kişi, +%{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değeri kazanır. Etkisi bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tura{/g} dek sürer.

The wielder gains +{uip|Dodge|9b5b0c3fdcb5447898d3d8360099f50d}% {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} until their next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}.
